CVXPY
Minimize
  Sum(Vstack(Promote(2.0, (2, 2)) @ x), None, False)
Subject To
 29: 1.0 <= x
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: +2 x_0 +2 x_1 +2 x_2 +2 x_3
Subject to
 c1: -1 x_0 <= -1
 c2: -1 x_1 <= -1
 c3: -1 x_2 <= -1
 c4: -1 x_3 <= -1
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 x_2 free
 x_3 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Minimize
 Obj: +2 x_0_0 +2 x_0_1 +2 x_1_0 +2 x_1_1
Subject to
 29_0_0: +1 x_0_0 >= +1
 29_0_1: +1 x_0_1 >= +1
 29_1_0: +1 x_1_0 >= +1
 29_1_1: +1 x_1_1 >= +1
Bounds
 x_0_0 free
 x_0_1 free
 x_1_0 free
 x_1_1 free
End
